text: FX is an Portuguese pay television channel owned by Warner Bros. Discovery EMEA. The channel originally launched as the Portuguese version of Discovery Health Channel on 6 August 2003. The channel was relaunched as Discovery Home & Health on 1 May 2005. On 2 May 2024, Warner Bros. Discovery EMEA announced that the Portuguese version of Discovery Home & Health would be rebranded as FX on 12 July 2024. == Logos == file:Discovery H&H.png;|10 September 2011-12 July 2024 file:FX Logo 2023.svg|12 July 2024-present Category:Television channels in Europe Category:Television channels in Africa
title: FX (Portuguese TV channel)
